verses.text: \w A|strong="H1732"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H1732"\w* remembrance \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* sabbath.
Rebuke \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w*, O Lord, \w in|strong="H3588"\w* thy indignation; nor chastise \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3588"\w* thy wrath.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* thy arrows \w are|strong="H3068"\w* fastened \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H0982"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy hand hath \w been|strong="H0776"\w* strong upon \w me|strong="H0982"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* health \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* flesh, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy wrath: \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* peace \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* bones, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* sins.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* iniquities \w are|strong="H3068"\w* gone \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* heavy burden \w are|strong="H3068"\w* become heavy \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
\w My|strong="H3318"\w* sores \w are|strong="H4941"\w* putrified \w and|strong="H4941"\w* corrupted, because \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* foolishness.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* become miserable, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* bowed \w down|strong="H1870"\w* \w even|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* end: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* walked sorrowful \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* day long.

\w For|strong="H7503"\w* \w my|strong="H2534"\w* loins \w are|strong="H0639"\w* filled \w with|strong="H0639"\w* illusions; \w and|strong="H0639"\w* there \w is|strong="H0639"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* health \w in|strong="H0389"\w* \w my|strong="H2534"\w* flesh.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* afflicted \w and|strong="H3068"\w* humbled exceedingly: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* roared \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* groaning \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart.

Lord, \w all|strong="H5750"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* desire \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H4725"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* groaning \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* hidden \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H0776"\w* troubled, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* strength hath left \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* light \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* eyes itself \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* friends \w and|strong="H6662"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* neighbours \w have|strong="H7563"\w* drawn \w near|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6662"\w* stood \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H6662"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H6662"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* stood afar \w off|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* sought \w my|strong="H7200"\w* soul used violence. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* sought evils \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w* spoke vain things, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* studied deceits \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w I|strong="H1870"\w*, as \w a|strong="H5307"\w* deaf \w man|strong="H7563"\w*, heard \w not|strong="H1870"\w*: \w and|strong="H2719"\w* as \w a|strong="H5307"\w* dumb \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* opening \w his|strong="H1869"\w* mouth.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0935"\w* became \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* man \w that|strong="H0935"\w* heareth not: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H0935"\w* hath no reproofs \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* mouth.
\w For|strong="H6662"\w* \w in|strong="H4592"\w* thee, O \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w*, \w have|strong="H7563"\w* I hoped: thou wilt hear me, O \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w* my God.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said: Lest \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H7665"\w* time \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies rejoice \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* whilst \w my|strong="H3068"\w* feet \w are|strong="H7563"\w* moved, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* speak great things against \w me|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* ready \w for|strong="H3117"\w* scourges: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* sorrow \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w continually|strong="H5769"\w* \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* declare \w my|strong="H3808"\w* inequity: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* think \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* sin.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* live, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* stronger \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* hate \w me|strong="H3615"\w* wrongfully \w are|strong="H7563"\w* multiplied.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w render|strong="H5414"\w* \w evil|strong="H7563"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* good, \w have|strong="H7563"\w* detracted \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, because \w I|strong="H5414"\w* followed goodness.
Forsake \w me|strong="H1288"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w*, O Lord \w my|strong="H3588"\w* God: do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* thou depart \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w me|strong="H1288"\w*.

Attend unto \w my|strong="H3068"\w* help, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation.
